Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Wheelhouse \Wheel"house`\, n. (Naut.) (a) A small house on or above a vessel's deck, containing the steering wheel. (b) A paddle box. See under {Paddle}. [1913 Webster]
wheelhouse n : an enclosed compartment from which a vessel can be navigated [syn: {pilothouse}]
